text: TO FIX WIRE, do an uninstall then reinstall (& re-login) on Wire when it nuts up ("waiting for network" & no msg notifications). CHECK WIRE AFTER EVERY ANDROID OS (& WIRE) UPDATE for "waiting on network". Then go into setup->devices in Wire and delete all the other copies of your same phone. Some Andoid OS updates seem to mess with the security keys in Wire making it think the phone is a different phone, so copies accumulate in "devices". Back up your Wire conversations before uninstall.
